CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( External_System_Link__c ,"sweetheartday"), "sweetheartday.org.au", IF(CONTAINS( External_System_Link__c ,"hero4heartkids"), "hero4heartkids.org.au", IF(CONTAINS( External_System_Link__c ,"twofeetheartbeat"), "twofeetheartbeat.org.au", "heartkids.org.au")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Website this Opportunity was generated from - if blank then Opportunity has been manually created
CustomField.label: Site
